item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, December 28, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Machine-Assisted Proof by Terence Tao [pdf] (67 points | 4 comments)

3. Ada's dependent types, and its types as a whole (113 points | 26 comments)

7. PixLens: A lens that turns the scenery you see into pixel art (46 points | 8 comments)
8. Scale Model of Boeing 777-300ER, Made from Manila Folders (459 points | 73 comments)
9. PCIe trouble with 4TB Crucial T500 NVMe SSD for >1 power cycle on MSI PRO X670-P (52 points | 27 comments)
10. TSMC's Arizona Plant to Start Making Advanced Chips (175 points | 70 comments)
11. Libobscura: Cameras Are Difficult [video] (15 points | discuss)
12. Cable-cutting tanker seized by Finland 'was loaded with spying equipment' (203 points | 63 comments)
13. Mixin is a trait/mixin and bytecode weaving framework for Java using ASM (32 points | 8 comments)

19. International Bank Note Society (15 points | 4 comments)
20. 1584 LAN party photos from 1996 – 2010 from Australia's island state archived (113 points | 35 comments)

22. Show HN: I made a web app to bring children's drawings to life (159 points | 55 comments)
23. Bench accounting services shutting down (248 points | 242 comments)
24. Progressive Loss of Function in a Limb Enhancer During Snake Evolution (2016) (4 points | 2 comments)
25. Breaking the Mirror – A Look at Apple's New iPhone Remote Control Feature [video] (72 points | 8 comments)
26. The paper passport's days are numbered (114 points | 221 comments)
27. How to Cure Acid Reflux with Simple Exercise: An Anecdotal Study (85 points | 22 comments)
28. Evolution journal editors resign en masse to protest Elsevier changes (77 points | 23 comments)
29. PQConnect: Automated Post-Quantum End-to-End Tunnels (55 points | 12 comments)
